casebody.data:
Uwe Andreas Josef ROMEIKE, et al., petitioners,
v.
Eric H. HOLDER, Jr., Attorney General. No. 13-471. Supreme Court of the United States March 3, 2014.

Motion of Alliance Defending Freedom, et al., for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.
